name: Clunk
description:
Here is my game Clunk! The goal is to keep the ball in the air as long as you can. If you hit the puck with the top ball, you get 10 points. With the middle ball, 5 points. With the bottom ball, 1 point.

Controls:

Top Ball    <-- (Q) (W) -->

Middle Ball    <-- (A) (S) -->

Bottom Ball    <-- (Z) (X) -->

Make sure to extract to a folder for it to work.

Also, feel free to comment your high score below! Leave a picture as proof!

Current Record Holders

Nick B. -- 1019 pts.

Brian K. -- 589 pts.

Chris H. -- 548 pts.
